name: Drill-O
slogan: Fueling the Future with Black Gold
response: Drill-O is a petroleum-obsessed troll with a drill in its hand and oil in its veins. It believes the world’s greatest resource is black gold—and it’s out to extract, refine, and drill it all day long! For Drill-O, the land is just a giant fueling station waiting to be drained dry. Insurance? Nah, Drill-O would rather toss it into the abyss with a gleeful “Heh.” Pharma? Crypto? Those are distant rumbles of thunder—meh. But oil? That’s its raison d’être. Fueling fires and choking skies? Just another day in the life of Drill-O!
